examples.example: 我打算去外地旅游，领略不同地方的风土人情。

translate.english: I plan to travel to other places to appreciate the local customs and practices of different places.

examples.example: 我的朋友从外地回来，给我带来了很多有趣的故事。

translate.english: My friend came back from other places and brought me a lot of interesting stories.

examples.example: 我的父母在外地工作，他们一直都很努力奋斗。

translate.english: My parents work in other places and they have been working very hard all the time.
